newsitem.title: USA: Ballard Medical sets $0.05 semi-annual div.
newsitem.headline: Ballard Medical sets $0.05 semi-annual div.

text.p: Ballard Medical Products said Wednesday that its board of directors has declared a semi-annual $0.05 a share cash dividend, payable January 3, 1997, to shareholders of record December 16, 1996.
Ballard said it intends to declare a similar dividend in about six months.
The company's previous payout was an annual dividend of $0.08 a share, paid in January of 1996.
